name: Dolphin Style
description: You fight like a dolphin, bunching your enemies up together to make it easier to pick them off.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Swim 3 ranks, base attack bonus +3 or monk level 3rd
benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on melee attack rolls against any creature adjacent to at least two of its other allies as long as you arenâ€™t flanking that creature, and your melee attacks ignore any bonus to AC gained by use of the aid another action.
